actions.committee: House Committee on Banking, Currency and Housing
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Currency and Housing.

official_title: A bill to amend the National Flood Insurance Act of 1968 to extend coverage under the flood insurance program to include losses from landslides as well as losses from mudslides.

summary.text: Extends coverage under the flood insurance program of the National Flood Insurance Act of 1968 to include losses from landslides as well as losses from mudslides, where such landslides are caused by underground lubrication resulting from high-intensity precipitation.

titles.title: A bill to amend the National Flood Insurance Act of 1968 to extend coverage under the flood insurance program to include losses from landslides as well as losses from mudslides.
